    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Hur gör man?</string>
            <string language="en">How do you do?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment allez-vous ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como você faz?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come fate?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι κάνετε;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo usted hace?</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här tränar vi på förståelse av dialoger, fraser, enkla texter som alla är inriktade på hur man går tillväga när man blir sjuk.Modul 3 - Hur mår du?Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here we train on the understanding of the dialogues, phrases, simple texts which are all focused on how to do this when you are sick. Module 3 - How are you? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">Sverige</string>
            <string language="sv">sjuk</string>
            <string language="sv">sjukvård</string>
            <string language="sv">vårdcentralen</string>
            <string language="sv">vårdcentral</string>
            <string language="sv">friskvård</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">sfi</string>
            <string language="en">Swedish</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">Sweden</string>
            <string language="en">ill</string>
            <string language="en">care</string>
            <string language="en">Center</string>
            <string language="en">medical center</string>
            <string language="en">Health</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier bilden wir auf dem Verständnis der Dialoge, Phrasen,
einfache Texte aus, alle die gerichtet werden auf, wie zu dies tun 
Sie, wenn Sie krank sind. Modul 3 - Wie geht es Ihnen? 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici nous nous exerçons sur l'arrangement des dialogues, 
expressions, les textes simples qui tous sont concentrés sur comment 
à faites ceci quand vous êtes malade. Module 3 - Comment
allez-vous ? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui nós treinamos na compreensão dos diálogos, frases,
os textos simples que todos são focalizados em como a faça isto 
quando você é doente. Módulo 3 - Como é você? 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui addestriamo sulla comprensione dei dialoghi, le frasi,
testi semplici che tutti sono messi a fuoco su come a faccia questo 
quando siete ammalati. Modulo 3 - Come siete? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ εκπαιδεύουμε στην κατανόηση των διαλογικών 
παραθύρων, φράσεις, απλά κείμενα που όλα στρέφονται στο πώς να 
κάνουν αυτό όταν είστε άρρωστοι. Ενότητα 3 - πώς είστε; 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí entrenamos en la comprensión de los diálogos, 
frases, los textos simples que todos se centran en cómo a haga esto 
cuando usted es enfermo. Módulo 3 - ¿Cómo es usted? 
Safir.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
